Text: Thanks for these.  NOW comics by far put out some of the best comics of that year.  Now if someone could find the rest of the series and Fright Night, I'd start being much happier.

#14 - 16 were the only issues that I had, but the Ghostbusters Fans wiki appears to have jpg scans of all issues from the entire series:

http://www.gbfans.com/wiki/Real_Ghostbusters:_NOW_Comics_Series
